Description: Fragment of Fikellura painted pottery amphora. With vertical chevron decoration.
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Tell Dafana, "Qasr", east annex (G), chamber 18
Curator's comments: Findspot number '18' scratched on the reverse surface. According F. Wascheck (AA 2008, p. 57-58) the chevron or zig-zag pattern is very late in the development of the Fikellura style; for an example of the pattern on an amphoriskos, see ibid. fig. 11. Wascheck dates its use to around 500BC, which would make this fragment one of the latest East Greek finds from the "Qasr" .
Bibliographic references: Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 229b)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.121, fig.11, p.210)
